content: S-WW Wing-tip self-drilling reamer Single winged self-drilling reamer for fastening untreated wood to metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast and robust drill tip Wings prevent thread engagement in wood Applications Fastening wood/untreated plywood to steel framing (up to 7 ga or 3 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Carbon steel Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Product Class: Standard Technical Data | Screw drive/recess type | Phillips head | Base materials | Carbon steel | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 311635 - Self-drill wing screw 10-24 x 1-7/16 PWH3 - Package Size 4000 pc - 311636 - Self-drill wing screw 12-24 x 2 PFH4 - Package Size 2000 pc - 311637 - Self-drill wing screw 12-24 x 2-1/2 PFH4 - Package Size 1500 pc - 311638 - Self-drill wing screw 1/4-20 x 2-3/4 PFH4 - Package Size 1000 pc
